recipe.title: Cointreau Spritz
ingredients: 4 ounces dry Prosecco or other sparkling white wine
instructions: Pour 4 ounces dry Prosecco or other sparkling white wine into an ice-filled large wine or rocks glass. Add 2 ounces strained fresh orange juice and 1/2 ounce Cointreau and top off with club soda. Gently stir together; garnish with half of an orange wheel.
